review.title: “cdac”
review.pros: Pros – good environment to work, new technology to learn is good
review.cons: Cons – they send to teach for pg-diploma students

review.title: “Keep it as last option”
review.pros: Pros – You will have a good learning experience in the early stages of your career, after 1 year you will realise you had been working on outdated technologies. Highly recommended to switch after 1 year else you may end up in spoiling your career.
review.cons: Cons – In most of the teams no process model is followed, some TL's doesn't know what are the actual objective of the project also they possess poor management skills you will be asked to revert back after coding for 2-3 months.Management is not concerned about credibility of employee
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Kindly follow some process while doing any project also don't take employee for granted.

review.title: “The worst organization in Hyderabad”
review.pros: Pros – Nothing. Please don't spoil your career by joining in this company because the chances are you may be working under a person who doesn't know the technical stuff or he/she doesn't know even how to manage project
review.cons: Cons – They expect some of the best talent to join their company but make them work on outdated technologies which have no standards.All the power is bestowed with team leads only. If the TL is not the fit candidate, then the only option for a new joinee is to leave the company.No proper HR policies. They are mere puppets.Lot of internal politics.If you have no project, then you are pushed into training department.No SDLC is followed. You are the client, developer,tester,architect,admin. If anything goes wrong then you are the only one to be seriously blamed.All the projects look like btech projects. They do not even qualify to be at enterprise level.Senior officers are present just to come to office,chitchat,read newspapers, do their personal work and leave office.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Nothing. Its the government organization!!!

review.title: “If no other option only then only u go for this”

review.cons: Cons – Team leads dont know anythng.They dont work also.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
